mapper.sql: order_id, order_partyA, order_partyB, order_status, order_money, task_id, order_start, order_end, opr, opr_time, other1, other2, other3, other4
mapper.select: select a.*, b.talents_name as orderPartyAName, c.talents_name as orderPartyBName, d.key_name as orderStatusName from order_info a left join talents_info b on a.order_partyA=b.code left join talents_info c on a.order_partyB=c.code left join dics_info d on a.order_status=d.key_value and d.dics_code='STATE' where a.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into order_info (order_id, order_partyA, order_partyB, order_status, order_money, task_id, order_start, order_end, opr, opr_time, other1, other2, other3, other4,code) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderPartyA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderPartyB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStart,jdbcType=DATE}, #{orderEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, #{opr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{other1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update order_info
order_partyA = #{orderPartyA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_partyB = #{orderPartyB,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_money = #{orderMoney,jdbcType=REAL},
task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_start = #{orderStart,jdbcType=DATE},
order_end = #{orderEnd,jdbcType=DATE},
opr = #{opr,jdbcType=INTEGER},
opr_time = #{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
other1 = #{other1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other2 = #{other2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other3 = #{other3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other4 = #{other4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update order_info set order_partyA = #{orderPartyA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_partyB = #{orderPartyB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_money = #{orderMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_start = #{orderStart,jdbcType=DATE}, order_end = #{orderEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, opr = #{opr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opr_time = #{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, other1 = #{other1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other2 = #{other2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other3 = #{other3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other4 = #{other4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
